entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Westport
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:22 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Rain, -0.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 5:37 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Rain
Temperature: -0.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -1.6°C
Wind: ENE 25 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Snow mixed with ice pellets and freezing rain this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 5:25 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 5:25 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 5. Forecast issued 5:25 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
